<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add an opportunity contact"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/opportunity/{opportunityid:[0-9]+}/contact/{contactid:[0-9]+}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds the selected contact to the opportunity with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"opportunityid":{"description":"Opportunity ID","type":"integer"},"contactid":{"description":"Contact ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
